rule.ruleDesc: Run Scheduled Action to Close Task
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: current.phase in $L.file~="Closure" and current.phase in $L.file~= "Cancelled")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"current.phase in $L.file~="Closure" and current.phase in $L.file~= "Cancelled""</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run Scheduled Action to Close Task (when ( Expression: current.phase in $L.file~="Closure" and current.phase in $L.file~= "Cancelled"))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runScheduledAction","calcType":"2","calcField":"","calcInterval":"","calcScript":"actionExecutionTime=new Date();","actionConditionXml":"<XmlCondition><collection logical=\"\" negate=\"\"><condition logical=\"\" negate=\"false\"><operand type=\"expression\"><Expression caption=\"\">\"current.phase in $L.file~="Closure" and current.phase in $L.file~= "Cancelled"\"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>","actionCondition":"(current.phase in $L.file~=\"Closure\" and current.phase in $L.file~= \"Cancelled\")","rulesetName":"","action":"close.denied.request.task"}
